==Trivia==
* {{PAGENAME}}, along with {{St|Freikugel}}, are the first skills that compare a unit's stat with an ally's stat.
** {{PAGENAME}} is also the first skill affected by {{Sgp|Phantom Spd}} due to stat comparisons between the owner and its allies.
